about_the_game:
Wojak Rush: A Cartoon-Themed Adventure

Wojak Rush is an exciting cartoon-themed adventure game packed with multiple levels, dynamic platforms, parkour mechanics, ragdoll physics, and challenging enemies. Wojak, bored with his mundane life, seeks refuge in sleep to escape reality. However, this time, his sleep takes a bizarre turn.

Trapped in a surreal and perilous dream, Wojak embarks on a relentless struggle to wake up. Despite his desperate attempts to escape, his dream is filled with relentless obstacles and enemies determined to keep him asleep. Overcoming these challenges won’t be easy, but with perseverance and the help of unexpected allies, Wojak can grow stronger and find his way out.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Navigate through diverse levels with engaging parkour and ragdoll mechanics.

  • Combat and Strategy: Use your turret to fend off waves of enemies and avoid obstacles that block your path.

  • Upgrade System: Collect gold from defeated enemies to enhance your skills and gear, making each challenge a stepping stone to victory.

  • A Unique Storyline: Immerse yourself in Wojak’s surreal dream world and help him wake up from his endless slumber.

Will you conquer the obstacles and awaken Wojak from this relentless dream? Can you outsmart the enemies and guide Wojak to freedom? The fate of Wojak lies in your hands—are you ready to take on the challenge?

name: Wojak Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 509 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 509 MB available space

short_description: Wojak Rush is a cartoon themed adventure game that combines parkour and rogue-like game mechanics that you will use against hundreds of monsters that come upon you. Are you ready to embark on a relentless struggle to wake the Wojak, who has had a strange dream, from his dream?
